page.mod_title: Course Introduction and CHK Search Overview

text_content.paragraph: CHK Search contains many features. For example:

bullets.bullet: Functionality is similar throughout the Wells/Sites, Contracts, and Leases tabs
Saving and customizing searches is easy, and
Search results can be easily exported to Excel for further analysis

graphic.alt: Photo collage of the Wells/Sites tab Team Search Criteria type, the Contracts tab Details Search Criteria type, and the Leases tab Location Search Criteria type.

page.prompt: CLICK THE NEXT ARROW TO CONTINUE.
